name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_259544d8-ffb7-4e00-aa52-00faebc7e406
text:
rule Potential_Brute_Force_Attempt_Excessive_User_Account_Lockouts {
  

  meta:
    
     author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "Potential_Brute_Force_Attempt_Excessive_User_Account_Lockouts"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Credential Access"
    mitre_attack_technique = "Brute force"


  events:
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Windows"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "4740"
    $e.principal.namespace = $user

    match:
    $user over 15m

  outcome:
    // For a multi-event rule an aggregation function is required
    // e.g., risk_score = max(0)
    // See https://cloud.google.com/chronicle/docs/detection/yara-l-2-0-overview#outcome_conditionals_example_rule
    $risk_score = 0

  condition:
    $e
}
author: TCS Cloud MDR COE team
